mapper.select: SELECT no, coffee_no, coffee, price, cust_id, name, to_char(reg_day, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS reg_day FROM order_list

SELECT no, coffee_no, coffee, price, cust_id, name, to_char(reg_day, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS reg_day FROM order_list WHERE 1=1 AND reg_day >= to_date(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND reg_day < to_date(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + interval '1 day'
AND coffee LIKE '%' || #{coffee} || '%'
AND name LIKE '%' || #{name} || '%'
